nodes.text: Sapwater was a slightly sweet drink that Wookiees preferred to rainwater because the sapwater was slightly sweeter. Sapwater was produced in a distillery in Tree Vikkilynn, one of the wroshyr trees around which the city of Kachirho was built.

Sapwater was first mentioned in the Star Wars canon in the 2016 Dorling Kindersley reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, sapwater was mentioned in the 2005 edition of the same book, though it was spelled "sap-water."
